channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Where do you live? That’s a complicated question for a California town with no street addresses
item.description: Carmel-by-the-Sea is known for its white-sand beaches, storybook buildings and famous former mayor, Clint Eastwood.

item.title: Harrison Ford, Miley Cyrus and more to be honored as Disney Legends at awards ceremony
item.description: Disney is bestowing “legends” status to 14 artists who have shaped the company, including Harrison Ford, Angela Bassett and Miley Cyrus.

item.title: Why the fastest-growing place for young kids in the US is in the metro with the oldest residents
item.description: No one younger than age 19 is allowed to live in The Villages, the massive retirement community in central Florida which has the highest median age of any place in the U.S.
